title: Floral Cascade Chandbali Earrings with South Sea Pearl Accent
materials: Crafted with a base of fine Silver. Adorned with an assortment of semi-precious stones featuring mixed color. The design is punctuated by two Moti of 4.23 ct. in total.
features: Inspired by the timeless Chandbali design, these earrings are a floral cascade. Each jhumka is intricately adorned with a harmonious blend of semi-precious stones, creating a captivating color palette. The South Sea pearl adds a touch of elegance and timelessness to the ensemble.
colors: The color scheme is a rich tapestry of colorful gemstones (NV Mix - 7.66 ct) set against the neutral of the silver. The South Sea pearl provides a soft
occasions: or any occasion where you want to add a touch of sophistication. These earrings are versatile enough for a grand celebration or a special evening out.
description: These Chandbali earrings are a contemporary take on a traditional design. The combination of semi-precious stones and South Sea pearl creates a luxurious and eye-catching accessory. Lightweight and comfortable, they are easy to wear for extended periods.
